name: Chhavi!
greetingText: Wish you all the best yaa!
wishText: Always keep smiling and making other smile! May you be succesful in every aspect of your life. Happy Birthday, Chhavi! 💖

textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Wish you all the best, Chhavi! blah blah... 🥳 🥳 🥳
text2: That's what I was going to do...
text3: But I thought of doing something a bit different
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: I hope you liked it! tell me if you did! :D
